thread.title: Hospitality / Kitchen staff
thread.title_full: Hospitality / Kitchen staff - Review of Staybridge Suites Times Square - New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Elizabeth C
title: Hospitality / Kitchen staff
text:
The hospitality / Kitchen staff was exceptional .
The four days I stayed at Staybridge Melinda, Theresa and Melvin waited on me hand and foot. They could not be nicer or more accommodating . Monday evening I arrived to late to get any food. They went into the kitchen to get me a bite to eat to hold me over. All three were extremely friendly and constantly working to keep the area clean and stocked.
